div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.h5: Visit our news section for COVID-19 updates

img.alt: Hard closure continues until after May 15

h3.a: Hard closure continues until after May 15

div.p: Under the executive order of New York governor Andrew Cuomo, Pioneer School District will remain in a hard closure through Friday, May 15. Superintendent Benjamin Halsey said in a call to...

img.alt: New tech support options available for home learners

h3.a: New tech support options available for home learners

div.p: Along with providing students with computers they can use to support their learning for the duration of the closure, Pioneer School District is also providing three forms of tech support in case of...

img.alt: OPERATION DEVICE FREEDOM AIMED AT SUPPORTING LEARNING AT HOME

h3.a: OPERATION DEVICE FREEDOM AIMED AT SUPPORTING LEARNING AT HOME

div.p: Pioneer School District is committed to providing the learning tools students need to succeed during this time of pandemic. For that reason the district is offering Operation Device Freedom....

The driveby Jumping Jack challenge by Delevan phys ed teachers Mr. Gertis & Ms. Miller has gone viral! Featured on Ch. 4: https://www.wivb.com/news/delevan-elementary-school-physical-education-teachers-challenge-students-to-jumping-jack-challenge/
Drive-up access to Pioneer's wifi network is available at the Middle School & Arcade Elementary. On your device, type in 'wifi' as the user name, 'visitor' as the password. Map: https://5il.co/f4d3
Helpful videos on how to hand in a picture of your work in Microsoft Teams, made by the Middle School's Mr. Lobianco. https://www.pioneerschools.org/o/pioneer-csd/page/how-to-videos--3
Check out the free online version of a course we have offered many times in the past, Love & Logic Parenting. https://youtu.be/iHYNQujiUS0
